name: The Wasteland Slayer
description:
The Wasteland Slayer is a game about killing aliens in the wasteland. There are five levels and you get a new gun eacth level! I hope this game was fun. The Wasteland Slayer is my second game :D

- NeoMatric

All assets and theme song made by NeoMatric

level music: 

Epic Battle Petri Hietala
